name: FIFA Soccer 97
overview: Once again, prepare to compete in the world's most popular sport, where the competition is fierce, even among the fans! Feel the adrenaline as you take on the best teams in the world, experiencing even more realistic gameptay than ever before. Who says, "It's only a game!?!" - 4 play modes: exhibition, league, playoff, and tournament - Password option to return to a set of games already in progress Improved graphics and gameplay - Detailed player, team, and game statistics
